title: New OCE Streamer
body: I'm new to streaming and I'm trying to promote the channel for some views :) I'm currently Diamond IV and I main Mid/Adc but can play all roles well. Feel free to add me on LoL (Kilianski - Diamond IV or Kilianski II - Platinum II) to see when I'm streaming/in-game and check it out at http://www.twitch.tv/kilianski

replies.body: atleast post it as a link...kind of pointless without links.
wed r u telkin abot i cliekd it no live wat u liar i report u to rito
You replied like 21 hours after the stream was on xD I streamed for 6 hours.
unless you are challenger plz leave
I think I'll stay mate, but thanks for the input!
